thread.title: Exclusive book offer

author: The Telegraph
title: Exclusive book offer
text: Telegraph readers can purchase Weber's Burgers, Sausages & More: Over 160 Barbecue Favourites for only £9.99, exclusively saving £5 (rrp £14.99). From the world's leading authority on grilling, Weber's Big Book of Burgers goes beyond the bun with over 80 inventive burger recipes, from the Four-Alarm Jalapeño Cheeseburgers to the Smoked Chicken Burgers with Bacon and Blue Cheese. Whether you're craving beef, pork, lamb, poultry or seafood, or want to go completely meatless, you're guaranteed to find a burger for you. You'll also find recipes for sizzling sausages, brats hot dogs, sides, and drinks to serve alongside. How to order Call 0844 8771 1514 or click here to claim Weber's Burgers, Sausages & More: Over 160 Barbecue Favourites for only £9.99 Terms and conditions: Offer price valid until Monday, September 14, 2015. Please add £1.99 for Standard Shipping or £3.99 for Premium for all orders. Lines open Monday to Friday 9am-6pm; Saturday 9am-5:30pm and Sunday 10am-2pm. Calls cost no more than 5p per minute from BT landlines (other networks may vary). telegraph.co.uk Follow @telegraph
